thread.title: Target: Buy 2 Get 1 Free Select Games, Books & More = BIG Savings on Harry Potter Items
thread.title_full: Target: Buy 2 Get 1 Free Select Games, Books & More = BIG Savings on Harry Potter Items

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Target: Buy 2 Get 1 Free Select Games, Books & More = BIG Savings on Harry Potter Items
text:
Target Shoppers! Now through February 18th, Target is offering Buy 2 Get 1 FREE select Board Games, Activity Sets, Puzzles, Books and Movies – mix & match. Even sweeter, the following Harry Potter items ARE included in the sale, which make for a sweet deal whenever you use the following Cartwheel Offers!
40% Off Harry Potter Winter at Hogwarts Coloring Set Cartwheel (exp. 2/18) 40% Off Newt Scamander Scrapbook Cartwheel (exp. 2/18) 40% Off Harry Potter Wizarding World Pop Up Book Cartwheel (exp. 2/18) 40% Off Wizarding World Movie Magic Vol 1 Cartwheel (exp. 2/18) Check out these in-store deal ideas: Buy 1 Newt Scamander Scrapbook $15.99 (reg. price) 
Buy 1 Harry Potter: Winter at Hogwarts Magical Coloring Sets $12.79 (reg. price) 
Buy 1 Fantastic Beasts & Where to Find Them Magical Characters & Places $12.79 (reg. price) 
Total = $41.57
Minus $12.79 for Buy 2 Get 1 Free Sale (thru 12/18) = $28.78
Use the 40% Off Newt Scamander Scrapbook Cartwheel – will deduct $6.40 
Use the 40% Off Harry Potter Winter at Hogwarts Coloring Set Cartwheel – will deduct $5.12 
Final cost $17.26 total – just $5.75 each!

Buy 3 Wizarding World Movie Magic Vol 1 $23.99 (reg. price) 
Minus $23.99 for Buy 2 Get 1 Free Sale (thru 12/18) = $47.98
Use the 40% Off Wizarding World Movie Magic Vol 1 Cartwheel – will deduct $19.19 
Final cost $28.79 total – just $9.60 each!
*As a price comparison, this same hardcover book is priced at $17.48 on Amazon with awesome reviews! 

Buy 3 Harry Potter: Winter at Hogwarts Magical Coloring Sets $12.79 (reg. price) 
Minus Buy 2 Get 1 Free Sale (thru 2/18) = $25.58
Use the 40% Off Harry Potter Winter at Hogwarts Coloring Set Cartwheel – will deduct $10.23 
Final cost $15.35 total – just $5.12 each!
(Thanks, Totally Target !)
